session.title: Welcome to GulfPCR Valves 2023
session.introduction: This session serves as the welcome and introduction to the GulfPCR Valves 2023 event. It sets the stage for the upcoming discussions and presentations focused on the latest advancements and best practices in transcatheter aortic valve implantation (TAVI) procedures. Attendees can expect to gain a comprehensive understanding of the current landscape in TAVI, including patient selection, procedural techniques, and long-term management considerations.
session.meta_description: Welcome to the GulfPCR Valves 2023 event, where the latest advancements and best practices in transcatheter aortic valve implantation (TAVI) procedures will be discussed.
session.teaser_title: Discover the Future of TAVI at GulfPCR Valves 2023
session.teaser_text: Get ready to explore the cutting-edge of transcatheter aortic valve implantation (TAVI) at the GulfPCR Valves 2023 event. Gain insights into patient selection, procedural techniques, and long-term management for optimal TAVI outcomes.

session.title: TAVI for bicuspid aortic stenosis patients

objectives.objective: To understand which patients with bicuspid aortic valve are good candidates for TAVI
To review the current sizing options in bicuspid aortic valve anatomy
To share technical tips and tricks to optimize TAVI procedure outcome in patients with bicuspid aortic valve

intervention.title: Imaging analysis and review of current sizing methods for bicuspid aortic valve
TAVI in a bicuspid aortic valve patient with large anatomy

session.introduction: This session delves into the considerations and best practices for performing TAVI in patients with bicuspid aortic valve anatomy. The key objectives include understanding which patients are suitable candidates, reviewing the current sizing options for bicuspid valves, and discussing technical tips and tricks to optimize TAVI outcomes in this patient population. Attendees will benefit from case presentations, imaging analysis, and interactive discussions to gain a comprehensive understanding of navigating the unique challenges associated with TAVI in bicuspid aortic stenosis.
session.meta_description: Explore the considerations and best practices for performing TAVI in patients with bicuspid aortic valve anatomy, including patient selection, sizing options, and technical optimization strategies.
session.teaser_title: Mastering TAVI for Bicuspid Aortic Stenosis
session.teaser_text: Discover the latest insights on TAVI for patients with bicuspid aortic valve anatomy. Learn which patients are suitable candidates, review sizing options, and gain technical tips to optimize TAVI outcomes in this complex patient population.

session.title: TAVI and access: alternating is wise

objectives.objective: To know why to use alternative access
To learn which alternative to choose for my patient
To know how to do it

session.introduction: This session focuses on the importance of utilizing alternative access routes for TAVI procedures, beyond the standard femoral approach. The key objectives include understanding the rationale for using alternative access, learning which options to choose for specific patient scenarios, and mastering the techniques for successful implementation. The session will cover surgical alternatives like subclavian and carotid access, as well as percutaneous options like axillary and transcaval access. Attendees will gain practical insights and strategies for navigating complex access challenges and optimizing TAVI outcomes.
session.meta_description: Explore the rationale, selection, and techniques for utilizing alternative access routes beyond the standard femoral approach for TAVI procedures, including surgical and percutaneous options.
session.teaser_title: Navigating Complex TAVI Access: Alternate Routes to Success
session.teaser_text: Discover the importance of alternative access options for TAVI procedures and learn which approaches to choose for specific patient scenarios. Gain practical insights on surgical and percutaneous access techniques to optimize TAVI outcomes.

session.title: Newer generation self-expanding platform: technical optimisation for common clinical challenges
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Medtronic

objectives.objective: To discuss challenges in TAVI procedural planning
To discuss valve choice in challenging anatomies
To learn more about optimization of valve deployment

intervention.title: Discuss therapeutic options and selected therapy for this patient

session.introduction: This session, sponsored by Medtronic, focuses on the technical optimization of newer generation self-expanding TAVI platforms to address common clinical challenges. The key objectives include discussing challenges in TAVI procedural planning, evaluating valve choice in challenging anatomies, and learning about strategies to optimize valve deployment. Attendees will benefit from case presentations, interactive discussions, and insights into the latest advancements in self-expanding TAVI technology and techniques to enhance procedural outcomes.
session.meta_description: Explore the technical optimization of newer generation self-expanding TAVI platforms to address common clinical challenges, including procedural planning, valve selection, and deployment strategies.
session.teaser_title: Overcoming TAVI Challenges with Newer Generation Self-Expanding Platforms
session.teaser_text: Discover the latest advancements in self-expanding TAVI technology and techniques to address common clinical challenges. Learn about optimizing procedural planning, valve selection, and deployment strategies for enhanced TAVI outcomes.

session.title: Essentials of lifetime management of TAVR patients using novel Myval THV
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Meril

objectives.objective: To learn about the novel Myval next generation THV technology, its key features, procedural and clinical benefits and learn about the clinical data in a vast cohort of patient population
To understand the CorAlign technique which enables predictable and precise commissural and coronary alignment thus preserving coronary access
To understand the technique of precise sizing, positioning and deployment of Myval THV

intervention.title: Introduction to novel Myval balloon expandable THV and St. Barts experience on XL sizes
Clinical experience with novel Myval THV in Saudi Arabia

session.introduction: This session, sponsored by Meril, focuses on the essentials of lifetime management for TAVR patients using the novel Myval transcatheter heart valve (THV) technology. The key objectives include learning about the Myval THV features, procedural and clinical benefits, and clinical data from a vast patient population. Attendees will also gain insights into the CorAlign technique, which enables predictable and precise commissural and coronary alignment, as well as the optimal approach for sizing, positioning, and deployment of the Myval THV. This session provides a comprehensive understanding of the latest advancements in TAVR management to ensure long-term patient outcomes.
session.meta_description: Explore the essentials of lifetime management for TAVR patients using the novel Myval transcatheter heart valve (THV) technology, including its features, procedural and clinical benefits, and the CorAlign technique for precise valve deployment.
session.teaser_title: Optimizing Lifetime TAVR Management with the Myval THV
session.teaser_text: Discover the latest advancements in TAVR management using the novel Myval transcatheter heart valve (THV) technology. Learn about its key features, clinical benefits, and the CorAlign technique for precise valve deployment to ensure long-term patient outcomes.

session.title: Evidence gap and new indications

objectives.objective: To discuss indications for TAVI for which there is not clear evidence
To evaluate treatment indications for patients with asymptomatic aortic stenosis
To learn about new options for patients with pure aortic regurgitation

intervention.title: A case of moderate symptomatic aortic stenosis
Evidence gaps in the treatment of aortic stenosis
A case of pure aortic regurgitation
New treatment options for patients with aortic regurgitation

session.introduction: This session explores the indications for TAVI where there is a lack of clear evidence, evaluates treatment options for patients with asymptomatic aortic stenosis, and examines new treatment possibilities for patients with pure aortic regurgitation. The session features case discussions on moderate symptomatic aortic stenosis, evidence gaps in aortic stenosis treatment, and a case of pure aortic regurgitation with new treatment options. The discussions aim to provide insights and address key learnings for the audience.
session.meta_description: Explore the indications for TAVI with unclear evidence, treatment options for asymptomatic aortic stenosis, and new treatments for pure aortic regurgitation. Gain insights from case discussions and address key learnings.
session.teaser_title: Bridging the Evidence Gap: New Frontiers in Aortic Valve Interventions
session.teaser_text: Discover the latest advancements and uncharted territories in TAVI, from treating asymptomatic aortic stenosis to exploring novel therapies for pure aortic regurgitation. Dive into insightful case discussions and unlock the key learnings to enhance your clinical practice.

session.title: Valve-in-valve: not as simple as it looks

objectives.objective: To appreciate the principles of valve selection for initial and subsequent procedures
To improve your understanding of how to anticipate, plan and perform a TAV-in-TAV procedure
To understand how to prevent coronary obstruction

intervention.title: Sapien 3 valve in degenerated evolute valve

session.introduction: This session delves into the complexities of valve-in-valve (TAV-in-TAV) procedures, aiming to improve understanding of the principles of valve selection, planning, and execution of these challenging interventions. The session features case discussions on Sapien 3 valve implantation in a degenerated Evolute valve, as well as the reverse scenario of an Evolute valve in a degenerated Sapien valve. The discussions focus on anticipating and preventing complications, such as coronary obstruction, to optimize outcomes for patients requiring TAV-in-TAV procedures.
session.meta_description: Explore the intricacies of valve-in-valve (TAV-in-TAV) procedures, including principles of valve selection, planning, and execution to prevent complications like coronary obstruction. Gain insights from case discussions on Sapien 3 and Evolute valve-in-valve scenarios.
session.teaser_title: Navigating the Complexities of Valve-in-Valve Procedures
session.teaser_text: Delve into the challenges and best practices of valve-in-valve interventions. Learn how to anticipate and prevent complications, such as coronary obstruction, to ensure optimal outcomes for patients requiring these complex procedures.

session.title: From access to annulus: overcoming challenging anatomies
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Abbott

objectives.objective: To learn how to select your TAVI device in order to achieve stable deployment in 90 degrees horizontal aorta
To witness smooth deliverabilty even crossing tight and tortous anatomy
To be ready for future coronary access regardless of the height of left or right coronaries

intervention.title: Case 1: recorded case (TAVI case with Navitor with FlexNav system)

session.introduction: This session, sponsored by Abbott, focuses on strategies for overcoming challenging anatomies in TAVI procedures. It explores how to select the appropriate TAVI device to achieve stable deployment in a 90-degree horizontal aorta, ensure smooth deliverability even in tight and tortuous anatomy, and maintain future coronary access regardless of the height of the left or right coronaries. The session features case presentations demonstrating the use of the Navitor TAVI system with the FlexNav delivery system to address these complex anatomical challenges.
session.meta_description: Discover strategies for overcoming challenging anatomies in TAVI procedures, including device selection for stable deployment in horizontal aorta, smooth deliverability in tight and tortuous anatomy, and maintaining future coronary access. Explore case presentations showcasing the Navitor TAVI system with FlexNav delivery.
session.teaser_title: Mastering Complex Anatomies: TAVI Strategies for Stable Deployment and Future Access
session.teaser_text: Learn how to navigate challenging anatomies in TAVI procedures. Discover device selection techniques for stable deployment, smooth deliverability, and maintaining future coronary access, even in the most complex cases.

session.title: Learning how to manage TAVI complications

objectives.objective: To understand how to predict major TAVI complication
To know how to evaluate critical TAVI complications
To learn how to treat TAVI complications

session.introduction: This session focuses on understanding, evaluating, and managing major TAVI complications. The objectives include learning how to predict potential TAVI complications, effectively evaluate critical TAVI complications, and develop strategies to treat these complications. The session aims to provide attendees with the necessary knowledge and skills to anticipate, recognize, and appropriately manage TAVI-related complications, ensuring optimal patient outcomes.
session.meta_description: Gain insights on predicting, evaluating, and managing major TAVI complications. Develop the knowledge and skills to anticipate, recognize, and effectively treat TAVI-related complications, ensuring optimal patient outcomes.
session.teaser_title: Mastering TAVI Complication Management: A Critical Skill for Optimal Outcomes
session.teaser_text: Explore strategies to predict, evaluate, and manage major TAVI complications. Equip yourself with the necessary knowledge and skills to anticipate, recognize, and appropriately treat TAVI-related complications, ensuring the best possible outcomes for your patients.

session.title: Wrap up
session.introduction: This session serves as a wrap-up for the event, summarizing the key learnings and insights gained throughout the various sessions. The session aims to consolidate the knowledge and provide attendees with a comprehensive understanding of the latest advancements, best practices, and strategies in the field of TAVI and aortic valve interventions.
session.meta_description: This wrap-up session consolidates the key learnings and insights gained throughout the event, providing attendees with a comprehensive understanding of the latest advancements and best practices in TAVI and aortic valve interventions.

session.teaser_text: Join us for the final session of the event, where we'll consolidate the key learnings and insights gained throughout the various sessions. Unlock a comprehensive understanding of the latest advancements and best practices in TAVI and aortic valve interventions.

session.introduction: The GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Opening Ceremony marks the beginning of this prestigious event, which brings together healthcare professionals from the Gulf region and beyond. session.title: Left main PCI: LIVE Case from Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia

objectives.objective: To learn how to select the patient for left main PCI
To learn the best techniques to use in individual patient
To discuss the role of imaging in stenting

intervention.title: Strategic and technical discussion of the LIVE Case
Key objectives, strategy, tools and technique
LIVE Case from Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia

session.introduction: This session focuses on the management of left main coronary artery disease, a complex and challenging scenario in interventional cardiology. Attendees will have the opportunity to learn from a LIVE case demonstration performed at the Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Key objectives include understanding patient selection criteria, selecting the best techniques for individual patients, and the role of imaging in guiding the PCI procedure. Experts will provide strategic and technical discussions, highlighting the critical decision-making process, tools, and techniques employed during the LIVE case. Audience interaction and feedback will further enrich the learning experience.
session.meta_description: Attend this session to learn from a LIVE case demonstration of left main PCI performed at the Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Gain insights into patient selection, technique selection, and the role of imaging in guiding the procedure.
session.teaser_title: Mastering Left Main PCI: Insights from a LIVE Case
session.teaser_text: Join this session to learn from a LIVE case demonstration of left main PCI performed at the Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Discover the latest techniques and the role of imaging in guiding complex coronary interventions.

session.title: OCT ready for your PCI in the cathlab
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Abbott

objectives.objective: To learn how to be OCT ready everyday in your cathlab
To learn MLD-MAX algorithm and use of AI to perform PCI
To discuss OCT image interpretation on an interactive session with experts

intervention.title: Image Acquisition A-Z for OCT in the cath lab
MLD MAX for OCT step by step and image interpretation
Tips and tricks for being OCT ready anytime

session.introduction: This session, sponsored by Abbott, focuses on the practical integration of Optical Coherence Tomography (OCT) in daily PCI practice. Attendees will learn how to be "OCT-ready" in the catheterization laboratory, including the step-by-step process of image acquisition, interpretation, and utilizing the MLD-MAX algorithm and AI-powered tools to optimize PCI outcomes. Expert guidance will be provided on navigating complex cases and leveraging OCT insights to make informed decisions during the procedure.
session.meta_description: Learn how to be "OCT-ready" in the catheterization laboratory, including image acquisition, interpretation, and utilizing the MLD-MAX algorithm and AI-powered tools to optimize PCI outcomes. Gain expert guidance on navigating complex cases with OCT.
session.teaser_title: Unlock the Power of OCT in Your PCI Practice
session.teaser_text: Discover how to seamlessly integrate Optical Coherence Tomography (OCT) into your daily PCI practice. Learn the step-by-step process of image acquisition, interpretation, and leveraging advanced algorithms and AI to optimize procedural outcomes.

session.title: How to make simple complex cases. Hands on lab in OCT
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Abbott

objectives.objective: To learn how to use novel AI OCT features in complex clinical scenarios
To learn how streamline decisions based on OCT images to optimize stent results
To enhance your experience in OCT image interpretation interacting with advanced technological platform and experts

intervention.title: Dealing with complex procedures: real world step by step imaging guidance
Key OCT findings that make the difference
Actionable imaging to optimize decisions in various coronary settings (LM, true bifurcation, severe calcification, diffuse disease, ISR)

session.introduction: This session, sponsored by Abbott, focuses on leveraging Optical Coherence Tomography (OCT) to navigate complex coronary interventions. Attendees will learn how to utilize novel AI-powered OCT features to streamline decision-making and optimize stent results in challenging clinical scenarios, such as left main disease, true bifurcations, severe calcification, diffuse disease, and in-stent restenosis. Through interactive discussions and hands-on demonstrations, participants will enhance their expertise in OCT image interpretation and gain practical insights to deliver better patient care.
session.meta_description: Discover how to utilize novel AI-powered OCT features to navigate complex coronary interventions, including left main disease, true bifurcations, severe calcification, diffuse disease, and in-stent restenosis. Enhance your expertise in OCT image interpretation and optimize procedural outcomes.
session.teaser_title: Mastering Complex Cases with OCT: A Hands-On Approach
session.teaser_text: Explore how to leverage Optical Coherence Tomography (OCT) to navigate complex coronary interventions. Learn to utilize AI-powered OCT features to streamline decision-making and optimize stent results in challenging clinical scenarios.

session.title: Challenging scenarios in cardiogenic shock
session.subtitle: With the collaboration of the Saudi Arabian Cardiac Intervention Society (SACIS)

objectives.objective: To learn physiology and stages of cardiogenic shock
To learn different modalities in treating cardiogenic shock
To learn how to manage a patient undergoing high-risk PCI with cardiogenic shock

intervention.title: Case 1 - Left main with cardiogenic shock
Case 2 - Cardiogenic shock in setting of multivessel disease

session.introduction: This session delves into the complex management of cardiogenic shock, covering key aspects such as the physiology and stages of the condition, as well as different modalities for treatment. Through a series of case studies, the speakers showcase their approach to tackling challenging scenarios, including left main disease with cardiogenic shock, cardiogenic shock in the setting of multivessel disease, and the use of ECMO during high-risk PCI. The session aims to equip the audience with the knowledge and strategies to effectively manage patients with cardiogenic shock, emphasizing the importance of tailored treatment plans and innovative thinking.
session.meta_description: Explore the management of cardiogenic shock, including the physiology, treatment modalities, and case studies showcasing approaches to challenging scenarios like left main disease, multivessel disease, and the use of ECMO during high-risk PCI.
session.teaser_title: Challenging scenarios in cardiogenic shock
session.teaser_text: Discover the latest insights on managing cardiogenic shock, from understanding the physiology to implementing effective treatment strategies. Learn from case studies that highlight innovative approaches to tackling complex scenarios.

session.title: Challenging scenarios in STEMI patients
session.subtitle: With the collaboration of the Emirates Cardiac Society and the Iraqi Cardio-Thoracic Society

objectives.objective: To discuss challenges during difficult STEMI scenarios
To learn best tips and tricks to tackle challenging STEMI cases
To be innovative and think outside the box

intervention.title: Case 1 - STEMI in a patient with left main stem disease
Case 3 - STEMI in a patient with previous stent
Case 4 - STEMI aberrant right coronary artery

session.introduction: This session focuses on navigating the complexities of STEMI management, with a collaborative effort from the Emirates Cardiac Society and the Iraqi Cardio-Thoracic Society. The speakers present a series of challenging STEMI cases, including a patient with left main stem disease, a case with "crossroads" in primary STEMI, a STEMI in a patient with a previous stent, and a STEMI with an aberrant right coronary artery. The session aims to equip the audience with innovative strategies and out-of-the-box thinking to tackle these difficult scenarios, emphasizing the importance of tailored treatment approaches and the ability to adapt to unexpected challenges.
session.meta_description: Explore challenging STEMI cases, including left main stem disease, "crossroads" in primary STEMI, STEMI in a patient with a previous stent, and STEMI with an aberrant right coronary artery. Learn innovative strategies and out-of-the-box thinking to tackle these difficult scenarios.

session.teaser_text: Discover how to navigate the complexities of STEMI management through a series of challenging case studies. Learn innovative strategies and out-of-the-box thinking to tackle unexpected scenarios and deliver tailored treatment approaches.

intervention.title: TAVI in extremely complex bicuspid aortic valve anatomy
Treatment strategy for structural dysfunction of TAVI implanted to treat surgical aortic valve replacement failure

session.introduction: This session comprises selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions, focusing on challenging structural interventions. The speakers present cases and discussions on TAVI in extremely complex bicuspid aortic valve anatomy, as well as the treatment strategy for structural dysfunction of TAVI implanted to treat surgical aortic valve replacement failure. The session aims to provide insights and strategies for managing these complex structural interventions, highlighting the importance of thorough planning, specialized techniques, and effective decision-making.
session.meta_description: Explore selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions on challenging structural interventions, including TAVI in complex bicuspid aortic valve anatomy and treatment strategies for TAVI dysfunction after surgical aortic valve replacement failure.

session.title: Left main stenting: one vs. two stent strategy
session.subtitle: Session comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions

intervention.title: How imaging changed my decision in left main bifurcation
One up rest down: STEMI with cardiogenic syndrome (left main equivalent disease)
ACS in a middle-aged female with cervical cancer - A CHIP case

session.introduction: This session, comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions, explores the decision-making process between a one-stent or two-stent strategy for left main bifurcation interventions. The speakers present cases that highlight how imaging can influence the treatment approach, including a STEMI case with cardiogenic syndrome (left main equivalent disease) and an acute coronary syndrome case in a middle-aged female with cervical cancer. The session aims to provide valuable perspectives on the optimal stenting strategy for left main lesions, emphasizing the importance of comprehensive evaluation and tailored decision-making.
session.meta_description: Explore selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions on the decision-making process between one-stent or two-stent strategies for left main bifurcation interventions. Gain insights on how imaging can influence the treatment approach in complex cases.
session.teaser_title: Left main stenting: one vs. two stent strategy
session.teaser_text: Discover the decision-making process between one-stent or two-stent strategies for left main bifurcation interventions. Learn how imaging can influence the treatment approach in complex cases, including STEMI with cardiogenic syndrome and acute coronary syndrome in a middle-aged female.

session.title: How artificial intelligence can help in optimising PCI for treatment of complex lesions
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Abbott

objectives.objective: To learn how artificial intelligence with OCT simplifies procedural strategy, reduce operation time and contrast
To understand value of actionable intracoronary imaging and physiology in optimising patient outcomes
To know the impact of DES platform in the management of a complex patient

intervention.title: Key objectives, strategy, tools and techniques
LIVE Case from Mohammed Bin Khalifa Bin Salman Al Khalifa Specialist Cardiac Centre - Awali, Bahrain
DAPT for patients with complex PCI and high bleeding risk patients
How artificial intelligence simplifies procedural strategy and provides actionable insights for complex PCI

session.introduction: This session, sponsored by Abbott, explores how artificial intelligence (AI) and intracoronary imaging can optimize PCI for the treatment of complex lesions. The speakers discuss the value of actionable intracoronary imaging and physiology in improving patient outcomes, as well as the impact of the DES platform in managing complex patients. The session features a live case from the Mohammed Bin Khalifa Bin Salman Al Khalifa Specialist Cardiac Centre in Bahrain, demonstrating how AI can simplify procedural strategy, reduce operation time and contrast usage, and provide actionable insights for complex PCI. The session aims to equip the audience with the latest advancements in AI-assisted PCI for complex lesions.
session.meta_description: Discover how artificial intelligence (AI) and intracoronary imaging can optimize PCI for complex lesions. Learn about the value of actionable imaging and physiology, the impact of DES platforms, and a live case demonstrating how AI can simplify procedural strategy, reduce operation time and contrast, and provide actionable insights.
session.teaser_title: How artificial intelligence can help in optimising PCI for treatment of complex lesions
session.teaser_text: Explore the latest advancements in AI-assisted PCI for complex lesions. Understand how AI and intracoronary imaging can optimize procedural strategy, reduce operation time and contrast, and provide actionable insights to improve patient outcomes.

session.title: Next-generation complex PCI toolkit and novel balloon expandable Myval THV
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Meril

objectives.objective: To understand novel tools and techniques for effective management of bifurcation lesions and long diffused lesions using dedicated stenting solutions
To learn about the novel Myval next generation THV technology, its key features, procedural and clinical benefits and learn about the clinical data in a vast cohort of patient population
To understand the CorAlign technique which enables predictable and precise commissural and coronary alignment thus preserving coronary access
To understand the technique of precise sizing, positioning and deployment of Myval THV

intervention.title: Managing complex lesions and emergence of metal-free PCI with next generation thin strut BRS
Tapered vessels need tapered stenting solutions
Myval THV design philosophy with compare TAVI and landmark randomized clinical trial update
Extending treatment opportunities in pulmonary valve interventions
Myval THV case kaleidoscope | Easy access, precise positioning, accurate deployment, intuitive coronary alignment

session.introduction: This session provides a comprehensive overview of the latest tools and techniques for effective management of complex coronary and structural heart disease interventions. It covers the use of dedicated stenting solutions for bifurcation lesions and long diffused lesions, as well as the novel Myval next-generation transcatheter heart valve (THV) technology. Key highlights include understanding the CorAlign technique for precise commissural and coronary alignment, and the procedural and clinical benefits of the Myval THV. The session also explores the treatment of large annuli, pure aortic regurgitation, and extending treatment opportunities in pulmonary valve interventions. Through case presentations, the session demonstrates the ease of access, precise positioning, accurate deployment, and intuitive coronary alignment offered by the Myval THV.
session.meta_description: Discover the latest tools and techniques for effective management of complex coronary and structural heart disease interventions, including dedicated stenting solutions and the novel Myval next-generation transcatheter heart valve (THV) technology.
session.teaser_title: Next-generation complex PCI toolkit and novel balloon expandable Myval THV
session.teaser_text: Explore the latest tools and techniques for effective management of complex coronary and structural heart disease interventions, including dedicated stenting solutions and the novel Myval next-generation transcatheter heart valve (THV) technology.

session.subtitle: Session comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions

intervention.title: Challenges in approach to rocky bifurcated lesion
Bifurcation PCI in a challenging case

session.introduction: This session focuses on tailored approaches to complex bifurcation PCI, featuring selected clinical case submissions from the GulfPCR-GIM 2023 conference. The session covers a range of challenging bifurcation cases, including PCI to a trifurcation left main, a rocky bifurcated lesion, a case of previously operated open mitral valvotomy, and the use of the DK nano crush technique for bifurcation stenting. Through interactive discussions and audience participation, the session provides valuable insights into the decision-making process, techniques, and strategies for navigating complex bifurcation interventions.
session.meta_description: Explore tailored approaches to complex bifurcation PCI through selected clinical case submissions from the GulfPCR-GIM 2023 conference, featuring interactive discussions and insights into the decision-making process, techniques, and strategies for navigating challenging bifurcation interventions.

intervention.title: The challenge of antegrade CTO PCI guided by ipsilateral collaterals

Interventional management of only wire crossable coronary lesion

session.introduction: This session focuses on challenging chronic total occlusion (CTO) interventions, featuring selected clinical case submissions from the GulfPCR-GIM 2023 conference. The session covers a range of complex CTO cases, including a "blind game" case where IVUS was used to unmask the lesion, a case with the challenge of antegrade CTO PCI guided by ipsilateral collaterals, and a case requiring extreme measures to overcome an uncrossable CTO lesion. Through interactive discussions and audience participation, the session provides valuable insights into the decision-making process, techniques, and strategies for navigating challenging CTO interventions.
session.meta_description: Explore challenging chronic total occlusion (CTO) interventions through selected clinical case submissions from the GulfPCR-GIM 2023 conference, featuring interactive discussions and insights into the decision-making process, techniques, and strategies for navigating complex CTO cases.

session.teaser_text: Discover challenging chronic total occlusion (CTO) interventions through selected clinical case submissions, featuring interactive discussions and insights into the decision-making process, techniques, and strategies for navigating complex CTO cases.

session.title: Abstracts session 1
session.subtitle: Session comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Abstracts submissions

intervention.title: PCI of NSTEMI in Kurdistan region of Iraq: how far are we from the guidelines?
Predictors and impact of myocardial injury (VARC-3 criteria) after TAVR
Clinical outcomes of the POT in bifurcation stenting: insight from a worldwide registry analysis
Diagnostic accuracy of strain imaging echocardiography for predicting severity of CAD in NSTEACS
EVAR and TEVAR using minimal contrast media
Left ventricular function recovery after PCI for CTO

session.introduction: This session features a selection of abstracts presented at the GulfPCR-GIM 2023 conference, covering a range of topics in cardiovascular interventions. The session includes discussions on PCI for NSTEMI in the Kurdistan region of Iraq, predictors and impact of myocardial injury after TAVR, the clinical outcomes of the POT technique in bifurcation stenting, the diagnostic accuracy of strain imaging echocardiography for predicting the severity of coronary artery disease in NSTEACS, the use of minimal contrast media in EVAR and TEVAR, and the recovery of left ventricular function after PCI for chronic total occlusion. Through interactive discussions and audience participation, the session provides valuable insights into the latest research and advancements in the field of cardiovascular interventions.
session.meta_description: Explore a selection of abstracts presented at the GulfPCR-GIM 2023 conference, covering a range of topics in cardiovascular interventions, including PCI, TAVR, bifurcation stenting, echocardiography, and CTO management.

session.title: Imaging-guided precision PCI of calcified lesion: LIVE Case from Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia

objectives.objective: To best perform PCI in heavily calcified lesions
To learn how to select devices for plaque modification

intervention.title: Strategic and technical discussion of the LIVE Case

LIVE Case from Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre, Riyadh - Saudi Arabia

session.introduction: This session focuses on the use of imaging-guided precision PCI for the treatment of heavily calcified lesions. The session objectives include learning how to best perform PCI in calcified lesions, how to select devices for plaque modification, and how to use imaging to guide therapy and optimize results. The session features a LIVE case from the Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, where the presenters demonstrate the key objectives, strategy, tools, and techniques for managing a complex calcified lesion. Through interactive discussions and audience participation, the session provides valuable insights into the effective management of calcified coronary lesions using imaging-guided PCI.
session.meta_description: Discover the use of imaging-guided precision PCI for the treatment of heavily calcified lesions, including a LIVE case from the Prince Sultan Cardiac Centre in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, where the presenters demonstrate the key objectives, strategy, tools, and techniques for managing complex calcified lesions.

session.introduction: This session features a series of selected clinical case submissions from GulfPCR-GIM 2023, focusing on challenging STEMI scenarios. Attendees will have the opportunity to explore various complex cases, including managing coronary artery dissection in a patient with ectatic coronary artery and acute myocardial infarction, treating an inferior STEMI with large thrombus burden, and utilizing intracoronary fibrinolytic as a last resort to save a patient. The session also covers the advantage of mechanical circulatory support post-cardiac arrest. Through interactive discussions, participants will gain valuable insights into the management of these complex STEMI cases.

session.introduction: This session showcases a series of selected clinical case submissions from GulfPCR-GIM 2023, focusing on various complications that can arise during catheterization procedures. Attendees will explore cases involving the retrieval of a broken jailed wire protruding through the left main ostium, a stuck and fractured left main stem stent balloon, coronary perforations, and other high-risk situations. Through interactive discussions, participants will gain valuable insights into the management and resolution of these complex complications, equipping them with the knowledge and skills to navigate similar challenges in their own practice.

intervention.title: Coronary steal phenomenon - Imaging to the rescue!

Adult T-type lymphoblastic lymphoma presenting as inferior wall myocardial infarction

session.introduction: This session focuses on selected clinical case submissions from GulfPCR-GIM 2023, highlighting uncommon causes of coronary ischemia. Attendees will explore cases involving coronary steal phenomenon, rare coronary subclavian steal syndrome, ostial left main severe stenosis after Bentall surgery, and an adult T-type lymphoblastic lymphoma presenting as inferior wall myocardial infarction. Through interactive discussions, participants will gain valuable insights into the recognition and management of these unexpected causes of coronary ischemia, emphasizing the importance of a comprehensive diagnostic approach and tailored treatment strategies.
session.meta_description: Explore uncommon causes of coronary ischemia, including coronary steal phenomenon, rare coronary subclavian steal syndrome, post-Bentall ostial left main stenosis, and lymphoblastic lymphoma presenting as MI. objectives.objective: To learn the optimal procedural steps to assess functional significance of coronary lesions

CATH CMD algorithm for assessment of INOCA

session.introduction: This session, sponsored by Abbott, focuses on the optimal utilization of physiological assessment tools to evaluate coronary lesions. Participants will learn the procedural steps for assessing the functional significance of coronary lesions using hyperemic and non-hyperemic resting indexes, such as FFR and RFR. The session also covers the CATH CMD algorithm for the assessment of INOCA using CFR and IMR indexes. Through case presentations and hands-on demonstrations with the Coroventis CoroFlow Cardiovascular System, attendees will gain a comprehensive understanding of how to integrate full physiological assessment into their clinical practice, moving beyond reliance on angiographic findings alone.
session.meta_description: Learn the optimal use of physiological assessment tools, including FFR, RFR, CFR, and IMR, to evaluate coronary lesions. Explore the CATH CMD algorithm for INOCA assessment and gain hands-on experience with the Coroventis CoroFlow Cardiovascular System.

session.teaser_text: Discover how to leverage physiological assessment tools, such as FFR, RFR, CFR, and IMR, to optimize the evaluation of coronary lesions. Learn the CATH CMD algorithm for INOCA assessment and get hands-on experience with the Coroventis CoroFlow Cardiovascular System.

session.introduction: This session provides an in-depth look at the latest advancements in transcatheter aortic valve implantation (TAVI) and mitral valve repair technologies. Key topics include the new generation Sapien 3 Ultra RESILIA valve, the innovative RESILIA tissue technology that offers enhanced calcium-blocking properties, and the latest experience with the PASCAL Precision System for transcatheter edge-to-edge mitral valve repair (TEER). Attendees will gain insights into how these cutting-edge technologies can improve durability and clinical outcomes for patients requiring interventional valve therapies.
session.meta_description: Discover the latest advancements in TAVI and mitral valve repair, including the Sapien 3 Ultra RESILIA valve, RESILIA tissue technology, and the PASCAL Precision System for TEER. Learn how these innovations can enhance durability and outcomes for patients requiring interventional valve therapies.

session.introduction: This session delves into the clinical evidence, guidelines, and technological advancements in the field of renal denervation (RDN) for the treatment of hypertension. Attendees will learn about the unmet clinical need for hypertension management in the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) region and the potential of RDN 2.0 to address this challenge. The session will also feature discussions on the practical selection of patients for ultrasound-based renal denervation (uRDN) and real-world case studies, providing valuable insights for clinicians looking to incorporate this innovative therapy into their practice.

session.introduction: This session provides a comprehensive overview of the various complications that can arise during percutaneous coronary interventions (PCI) in the catheterization laboratory. Attendees will learn about the latest guidelines, protocols, and tools for managing emergency situations, such as perforations, dissections, and cardiac arrests. The session also emphasizes the crucial role of the nursing and technical team in effectively responding to these critical events, highlighting the importance of coordinated teamwork and training for optimal patient outcomes.

session.introduction: This session delves into the management of complex chronic total occlusions (CTOs) through a series of case presentations and discussions. Attendees will learn about the latest techniques and strategies for successful CTO recanalization, including the use of the "last resort to success" approach and retrograde recanalization of ostial left anterior descending artery CTOs. The session also features a case of a re-attempted acute coronary syndrome (ACS) case, highlighting the challenges and perseverance required in managing these high-risk interventions.
session.meta_description: Explore the management of complex chronic total occlusions (CTOs) through case presentations and discussions. session.introduction: This session provides an in-depth overview of the Orbital Atherectomy System (OAS) device, including its mechanism of action, product features, and best practices for patient selection and case management. It covers key indications for using orbital atherectomy in calcified lesions and offers tips and tricks for its application during PCI procedures. The session also includes case presentations to illustrate the use of orbital atherectomy in challenging calcified lesions, as well as hands-on wet-lab sessions where participants can demo the device.

session.introduction: This session delves into the management of severely calcified lesions, a common challenge faced by interventional cardiologists. Discover various case presentations that illustrate the use of specialized techniques and tools to tackle these complex scenarios. Learn about the application of IVUS guidance and rota-cut for conquering tough calcium, the PCI of a stubborn fibrotic coronary lesion in a limited-capacity catheterization laboratory, the IVUS-guided rotablation approach in a CHIP case, and the management of a challenging calcified lesion in an acute coronary syndrome patient. Gain insights into the decision-making process and the successful outcomes achieved through these innovative strategies.

session.introduction: This session provides a comprehensive overview of the types, definitions, and mechanisms of stent failure. session.teaser_text: Discover how experts navigate complex left main coronary artery intervention scenarios, including a complex left main stump, left main coronary artery dissection, and acute bifurcation during cardiac arrest, in this collection of selected clinical cases from GulfPCR-GIM 2023.

session.title: How to make simple complex cases. Hands on lab in OCT
session.subtitle: Sponsored by Abbott

objectives.objective: To learn how to use novel AI OCT features in complex clinical scenarios
To learn how streamline decisions based on OCT images to optimize stent results
To enhance your experience in OCT image interpretation interacting with advanced technological platform and experts

intervention.title: Dealing with complex procedures: real world step by step imaging guidance
Key OCT findings that make the difference
Actionable imaging to optimize decisions in various coronary settings (LM, true bifurcation, severe calcification, diffuse disease, ISR)

session.introduction: This sponsored session by Abbott focuses on the use of novel AI-powered OCT features to guide complex percutaneous coronary interventions (PCI). Attendees will learn how to streamline decision-making based on OCT images to optimize stent results, particularly in challenging scenarios such as left main disease, true bifurcations, severe calcification, diffuse disease, and in-stent restenosis. The session aims to enhance the participants' experience in OCT image interpretation and provide hands-on guidance from experts to improve their ability to navigate complex coronary cases.
session.meta_description: Discover how to leverage novel AI-powered OCT features to guide complex PCI, including decision-making and optimization of stent results in challenging scenarios like left main disease, true bifurcations, severe calcification, diffuse disease, and in-stent restenosis.
session.teaser_title: How to make simple complex cases. Hands on lab in OCT
session.teaser_text: Learn how to use novel AI-powered OCT features to streamline decision-making and optimize stent results in complex PCI scenarios, such as left main disease, true bifurcations, severe calcification, diffuse disease, and in-stent restenosis.

session.title: Challenging cases – Best case submissions
session.subtitle: Session comprising selected GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Clinical Case submissions

intervention.title: Severe chest pain and shock in young female
Iatrogenic left main coronary artery type F dissection
Mechanical mitral valve thrombosis, can we treat it by catheter intervention?
Refractory ascites - From internal medicine to interventional cardiology

session.introduction: This session features a selection of compelling clinical case submissions from GulfPCR-GIM 2023. Dive into a range of complex and challenging cases, including a young female patient with severe chest pain and shock, an iatrogenic left main coronary artery type F dissection, a case of mechanical mitral valve thrombosis treated with catheter intervention, a case of refractory ascites managed through interventional cardiology, and a rotablation procedure that narrowly avoided becoming a nightmare. Each case is presented and followed by in-depth discussions, allowing the audience to engage and learn from these real-world experiences. This session offers valuable insights and lessons for navigating difficult clinical scenarios in cardiovascular interventions.
session.meta_description: Explore a selection of compelling clinical case submissions from GulfPCR-GIM 2023, including complex cases of severe chest pain, iatrogenic coronary dissection, mechanical mitral valve thrombosis, refractory ascites, and a challenging rotablation procedure. Gain insights from the presentations and discussions.

session.title: GulfPCR-GIM 2023 Closing Ceremony
session.introduction: This session marks the closing ceremony of the GulfPCR-GIM 2023 conference. The closing ceremony is an opportunity to reflect on the key takeaways, insights, and advancements discussed throughout the event. It serves as a platform to summarize the conference's highlights, recognize the contributions of speakers and participants, and set the stage for future editions of GulfPCR-GIM. The closing ceremony is an important event that brings the conference to a meaningful conclusion, fostering a sense of community and paving the way for continued collaboration and progress in the field of cardiovascular interventions.
